title: Blue Peter - Falling [1983 New Wave + Vertigo EP]
description:
Posting the first request I got by e-mail!

Blue Peter&#039;s second LP, Falling, sounds for the most part like a different band than on Radio Silence. The songs are more tuneful and produced, the overall ambiance is more nostalgic and reflective and Humphrey&#039;s vocals show a greater range of emotion. The result is an arguably stronger collection of songs, beginning with the pretty, open-sounding title track. The lead single, Don&#039;t Walk Past, was the band&#039;s most commercially successful song. It is very much a product of its time, with its slinky dance-pop sound. This is 320k Enjoy!
